tool_description: Classifies customer reviews into predefined categories such as product features, service aspects, or issue types to enable focused analysis.

structured_reviews_source.description: Source identifier for structured review data to classify

classification_scheme.description: Classification approach: product_features, service_aspects, issue_types, or custom

custom_categories.description: Custom category labels if using custom classification scheme

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for category assignment

multi_label_classification.description: Whether reviews can be assigned to multiple categories

error_messages: Invalid data source: structured_reviews_source not found or contains no review text.
Invalid classification scheme: Use one of [product_features, service_aspects, issue_types, custom].
Missing custom categories: custom_categories required when using custom classification scheme.
Confidence threshold error: confidence_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Classification model error: Unable to load or apply the specified classification model.
usage: Provide structured review data and specify classification scheme. For custom schemes, provide category labels. Returns categorized reviews with confidence scores.

total_reviews_classified.description: Total number of reviews successfully classified

category_distribution.description: Number of reviews in each category

category_labels.description: Names of categories used in classification

unclassified_count.description: Number of reviews that could not be classified with sufficient confidence

classification_summary.description: Summary of classification results and category insights
